required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized Study to Evaluate the Effect of Obicetrapib on Top of Maximum Tolerated Lipid-Modifying Therapies
clinical_study.official_title: A Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Randomized Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Effect of 10mg Obicetrapib in Participants With HeFH and/or ASCVD and LDL-C ≥70 and <100 mg/dL Who Are Not Adequately Controlled by Their Lipid Modifying Therapies

brief_summary.textblock: This study will be a placebo-controlled, double-blind, randomized, phase 3 study in participants with underlying heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HeFH) and/or ASCVD to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of obicetrapib as an adjunct to diet and maximally tolerated lipid-lowering therapy

detailed_description.textblock: This study will be a placebo-controlled, double-blind, randomized, phase 3 study in participants with underlying HeFH and/or ASCVD to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of obicetrapib as an adjunct to diet and maximally tolerated lipid-lowering therapy. The screening period for this study will take up to 28 days. Afterwards patients will be randomized to placebo or 10 mg obicetrapib for an 365 day treatment period. After the treatment period, patients will have an end of study follow-up visit.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
study_design_info.masking_description: placebo tablet made to resemble active

primary_outcome.time_frame: Percent change from baseline to Day 84 in LDL-C
primary_outcome.description: obicetrapib compared to placebo on LDL-C

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Percent change from baseline to Day 84 in ApoB
secondary_outcome.description: obicetrapib compared to placebo on ApoB

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Percent change from baseline to Day 84 in non-HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: obicetrapib compared to placebo on non-HDL-C

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Percent change from baseline to Day 84 in HDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: obicetrapib compared to placebo on HDL-C

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Percent change from baseline to Day 180 in LDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: obicetrapib compared to placebo on LDL-C

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Percent change from baseline to Day 365 in LDL-C
secondary_outcome.description: obicetrapib compared to placebo on LDL-C

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to end of study (30 days post last dose; approximately Day 395)
secondary_outcome.description: evaluate the effect of obicetrapib on the risk of MACE

intervention.description: placebo tablet made to resemble active
